en: I got my foot caught in a train door.
zh: 我的脚被火车门夹到了。

en: I ran to the station not to miss the train.
zh: 为了不误车，我一路跑到了车站。

en: I missed the train. I should have come earlier.
zh: 我没赶上火车，早知道就早点来了。

en: I got up early so as to be in time for the train.
zh: 我起得很早，为了能赶上火车。

en: I ran as fast as I could to catch the train.
zh: 为了赶上火车，我拼了命地跑。

en: I like to travel by train.
I went to Kobe by train.
I returned home by train.
I went to Boston by train.
zh: 我是坐火车去的波士顿。

en: I am used to hearing the train pass by my house.
zh: 我都习惯听火车从我家门前经过的声音了。

en: I took my place at the end of the line.
I stood at the end of the line.
When I got off the train, I saw a friend of mine.
zh: 下火车的时候，我碰见了一个朋友。

en: I like studying history.
I majored in history.
I want to study history.
I concentrated my attention on the little things of history.
zh: 我把注意力都集中在了历史的那些细枝末节上。

en: I will devote my life to the study of history.
zh: 我要用一生来研究历史。

en: I take great interest in history.
I'm interested in history.
I am not up on history.
I like history.
I have little interest in history.
I believe in the immortality of the soul.
We look up to him because of his politeness.
zh: 他很有礼貌，所以我们都很尊敬他。

en: I always buy fresh vegetables instead of frozen ones.
zh: 我总是买新鲜蔬菜，不买冷冻的。

en: I felt the cold wind come into the hall.
zh: 我感到一阵冷风吹进了大厅。

en: I like hot tea better than cold.
zh: 比起凉茶，我更喜欢喝热茶。

en: I want to go abroad, for instance, to Italy and Spain.
zh: 我想出国，比如去意大利和西班牙什么的。

en: I was brought to tears.
I couldn't control my tears.
I looked into the next room.
zh: 我朝隔壁房间看了一眼。

en: I became aware of being closely observed by a man sitting next to me.
zh: 我察觉到坐在我旁边的那个男人一直在盯着我看。

en: I was robbed of my wallet by the man sitting next to me.
zh: 我的钱包被坐在旁边的那个男人偷了。

en: I am a man who can't stand being alone.
zh: 我是个受不了一个人呆着的人。

en: I don't like being alone.
I can peel an apple.
I like apples.
I put quantity after quality.
zh: 我觉得质量比数量更重要。

en: I prefer quality to quantity.
zh: 比起数量，我更看重质量。

en: I am often confused with my brother.
zh: 别人经常把我跟我兄弟搞混。

en: I often watch night games on TV.
zh: 我经常在电视上看晚上的比赛。

en: I am proud of being a good son.
zh: 我为自己是个好儿子而感到自豪。

en: I have a good dictionary.
zh: 我有一本挺好用的词典。

en: I have a good English dictionary.
zh: 我有一本挺好用的英语词典。

en: I went into the town in search of a good restaurant.
zh: 为了找家好餐厅，我进城去了。

en: I don't have much interest in cooking.
Cooking's one of my strong suits.
I have not seen both of his works.
zh: 他的两部作品我都没看过。

en: I was a constant torment to my parents.
zh: 我以前总是让父母很头疼。

en: I have been a disappointment to my parents.
zh: 我一直让爸妈挺失望的。

en: I was able to get my parents to consent to my marriage.
zh: 我总算让我爸妈同意我的婚事了。

en: I never fail to write to my parents every month.
zh: 我每个月都会给家里写信。

en: I said "good night" to my parents and went to bed.
zh: 我跟爸妈说了声晚安就去睡了。

en: I contacted my parents.
I talked with my parents about my studying abroad.
zh: 我跟爸妈谈了谈出国留学的事。

en: I live with my parents.
I'm living with my parents.
I was often at odds with my parents.
zh: 我以前经常跟爸妈闹别扭。

en: I refused to eat until my parents came home.
zh: 我非得等爸妈回家才肯吃饭。

en: I helped my parents with the housework.
zh: 我帮爸妈干了点家务活。

en: I have run out of my traveling expenses.
I made use of the maps during my journey.
I negotiated with the travel agent about the ticket price.
zh: 我跟旅行社商量了一下票价。

en: I work for a travel agency.
I work in a travel agency.
I am looking forward to the trip.
Putting my traveling experience to good use, I started a travel agency.
zh: 我利用自己的旅游经验开了家旅行社。

en: I am short of money for my trip.
I will go on a trip.
I had a pleasant experience on my trip.
zh: 我这次旅行过得很愉快。

en: I always travel with travelers' checks instead of cash.
zh: 我旅行时总带旅行支票，不带现金。

en: "I like traveling." "So do I."
I like traveling.
I like to travel.
I enjoy traveling.
All during my trip I could not keep you out of my mind.
zh: 整个旅途中我一直在想你。

en: When I started traveling, I rarely felt lonely.
zh: 刚开始旅游的时候，我很少觉得寂寞。

en: I found the answering machine convenient.
zh: 我觉得那个电话留言机挺方便的。

en: I decided to study abroad.
Tell him I'm not in.
I made a decision to study abroad.
I was envious of the students who had studied abroad.
zh: 我挺羡慕那些留过学的人。

en: I went to Hokkaido to see the floating ice.
I have little, if any, interest in popular songs.
zh: 我对流行歌曲几乎没什么兴趣。

en: I have seen a shooting star once.
I've seen a shooting star once.
I can't stand up.
I stopped and waited for the car to pass.
zh: 我停下来等那辆车开过去。

en: I stopped and gazed at them.
I stood all the way.
I admire a person who expresses a frank opinion.
zh: 我很佩服那些有话直说的人。

en: I admire people who express their opinions frankly.
zh: 我欣赏那些敢于坦诚表达观点的人。

en: I went into the army.
I will consent to the divorce.
I put up a small hut in the backyard.
I had my hair cut at the barber's.
I had my hair cut at a barber's shop.
I like both science and math.
I bought half a dozen eggs.
I bought a few eggs and a little milk.
zh: 我买了几颗鸡蛋和一点牛奶。

en: I have an egg.
I bought eggs, meat, vegetables, and what not.
zh: 我买了鸡蛋、肉、蔬菜什么的。

en: I like the white of an egg.
I spent hours looking for the key that I had dropped.
zh: 我花了好几个小时找我弄丢的钥匙。

en: I was cool as a cucumber.
I was as cool as a cucumber.
I felt ill at ease.
I got gloomy and thought of giving up.
zh: 我变得很沮丧，想放弃了。

en: I was taken aback by a thunderclap.
I am in need of a responsible person.
zh: 我需要一个负责任的人。

en: I intend to study abroad next year.
I must sit for the entrance examination next year.
zh: 我明年得参加升学考试。

en: I have to take the entrance exams next year.
I will not live in Kobe next year.
I will live in Sasayama next year.
I plan to cycle around Shikoku next year.
zh: 我计划明年骑车环游四国。

en: I plan to go around the island of Shikoku by bicycle next year.
zh: 我计划明年骑自行车环游四国岛。

en: I will not live in Sanda next year.
I'm thinking of going abroad next year.
I will go abroad next year.
I want to go abroad next year.
I am thinking of going abroad next year.
zh: 我正考虑着明年出国呢。

en: I am going to Hawaii next year.
I want to come here next winter again.
zh: 我想明年冬天再来这儿。

en: I will be in high school next April.
zh: 明年四月我就上高中了。

en: I intend to study abroad in America next year.
zh: 我打算明年去美国留学。

en: There is a possibility that I may go to the United States next year.
zh: 我明年有可能会去美国。

en: I am going to go to America next year.
I will be sixteen years old next year.
I believe in the life beyond.
I hope to graduate from university next spring.
zh: 我希望明年春天能大学毕业。

en: I will be busy next week.
I will visit Nara next week.
I am leaving next week.
I'll set out for China next week.
I expect to be back next Monday.
I'm going to see the sights of London next week.
I will be traveling in Europe next week.
I will have finished the work by next week.
zh: 下周前我就能把活干完了。

en: I will be traveling round Europe next week.
zh: 我下周在欧洲到处旅游。

en: I have to hand in my report by next Wednesday.
zh: 我下周三之前得交报告。

en: I'm supposed to go to New York next week.
zh: 我下周按计划要去纽约。

en: I'm leaving for Chicago next week.
I must calculate how much money I'll spend next week.
zh: 我得算一下下周要花多少钱。

en: I'm going to Europe by way of Anchorage next week.
zh: 我下周经安克雷奇去欧洲。

en: I will be seventeen next week.
I am going to start a new job next week.
zh: 我下周要开始新工作了。

en: I'll go to Hokkaido next month with my friend.
zh: 下个月我要和朋友去北海道。

en: I will buy a new car next month.
I may go skiing at Zao next month.
zh: 下个月我可能会去藏王滑雪。

en: I will have been studying English for six years by the end of next month.
zh: 到下个月底，我就学了六年英语了。

en: This letter says he is going to marry Grace next month.
zh: 信上说他下个月要和格雷斯结婚。

en: I will go to Sydney on business next month.
zh: 下个月我要去悉尼出差。

en: I'll take a trip to Kyoto next month.
zh: 我下个月打算去京都玩一趟。

en: I meant to have come.
I'll invite whoever wants to come.
I like dark red better.
I was leaving for Paris the next morning.
zh: 我第二天早上就要动身去巴黎。

en: I had planned to leave for New York the next morning.
zh: 我原计划第二天早上出发去纽约。

en: I was in the bath, with the result that I didn't hear the telephone.
zh: 我刚才在洗澡，所以没听到电话。

en: I'll give this book to whoever wants it.
I have two children to support.
I got a bit carried away when I was dancing and got up on the table.
zh: 我跳舞跳嗨了，结果跳到了桌子上。

en: I stick to the point.
I saw a flock of sheep.
I'd like to stay in a Western-style hotel.
I persuaded Yoko to give up smoking.
I expected Yoko to give up smoking.
We have to conform to the rules.
I can read Spanish with ease.
zh: 我看西班牙语挺轻松的。

en: I acted the part of a fairy.
zh: 我扮演了一个小仙女的角色。

en: I remember playing with Yoshiko in that garden when we were young.
zh: 我记得小时候和佳子在那个花园里玩。

en: I have a lot of money in my savings account.
zh: 我的储蓄账户里有很多钱。

en: I made my way to the luggage office to collect the suitcase I had left there.
zh: 我去行李寄存处取我寄在那儿的行李箱。

en: I intended to have changed my schedule.
I was told to be ready to speak at a moment's notice.
zh: 我被告知要随时准备发言。

en: I was caught in a shower and got wet to the skin.
zh: 我遇上了一场阵雨，全身都淋透了。

en: I watch television in the evening.
I make it a rule to take a walk around the nearby pond in the evening.
zh: 我习惯晚上在附近的池塘边散步。

en: I have my supper at a quarter past seven.
I studied before supper.
I will be through with my homework before supper.
zh: 我晚饭前就能把作业写完。

en: I make a point of taking a walk before supper.
zh: 我习惯在晚饭前散散步。

en: I listen to the radio after dinner.
After dinner, I did my homework.
zh: 吃完晚饭后，我做了作业。

en: I play the piano after supper.
I play the guitar after dinner.
I watch television after supper.
I studied English for two hours after dinner.
zh: 晚饭后我学了两个小时英语。

en: I make it a practice to help my brother with his homework after supper.
zh: 我习惯晚饭后帮我弟弟写作业。

en: I finished doing the work before supper.
zh: 我在晚饭前把活儿干完了。

en: I play the guitar before dinner.
I study English after dinner.
I was invited to dinner.
I invited Jane to dinner.
I have been to the post office.
I walked as far as the post office, where I took the bus for Tokyo Station.
zh: 我走到了邮局，在那儿坐公交车去东京站。

en: I went as far as the post office.
I prefer working to doing nothing.
zh: 比起闲着，我更喜欢干点活。

en: I went to the park to play.
I am tired from playing.
I was determined not to give in to temptation.
I gave in to temptation and began to smoke a cigarette.
zh: 我没经受住诱惑，开始抽烟了。

en: I think that Yumi is sick.
I have a friend whose father is a famous actor.
zh: 我有个朋友，他爸是著名演员。

en: I got a famous singer's autograph.
zh: 我要到了一个著名歌手的签名。

en: I am a famous actor.
I had to part with my competent secretary.
zh: 我不得不和我那能干的秘书分开了。

en: I had a valid visa, so I was allowed to enter the country.
zh: 我有有效签证，所以获准入境了。

en: I do believe in ghosts.
I invited my friends to dinner.
I went to Kennedy Airport to see my friend off.
zh: 我去肯尼迪机场送朋友了。

en: I saw my friend to the station.
I didn't meet any of my friends.
I forgot to send New Year's cards to my friends.
zh: 我忘了给朋友们寄贺年卡。

en: I was calling my friend.
zh: 我刚才在给朋友打电话。

en: I met a friend.
I spent the weekend with my friends.
zh: 我和朋友们一起过的周末。

en: I'm waiting for my friend to arrive.
I don't have any friends.
I think it's sad to have no friends.
zh: 我觉得没有朋友挺凄凉的。

en: I think it's sad to not have any friends.
zh: 我觉得没有朋友挺可悲的。

en: I have no friends.
I've got no friends.
I decided to ask for my friend's help.
I decided to ask my friend for help.
I went to the airport to see my friend off.
I have been to the station to see my friend off.
I invited all my friends.
I've invited all my friends.
I waited half an hour for my friend, but he didn't turn up.
zh: 我等了朋友半小时，但他没露面。

en: I didn't want to be defeated in front of my friends.
zh: 我不想在朋友面前丢脸。

en: I have my friend's car at my disposal.
zh: 我朋友的车我可以随便开。

en: I am staying with a friend.
I want to pick out a present for my friend.
I got my friends to help me.
I telephoned my friend to congratulate him.
zh: 我给朋友打电话向他道喜。

en: I called up my friend to congratulate him on his success.
zh: 我打电话祝贺我朋友取得了成功。

en: I tried to talk a friend of mine out of getting married.
zh: 我试着劝我一个朋友别结婚。

en: I accommodated my friend with money.
zh: 我借了点钱给朋友周转。

en: I lent my friend some money.
I have a friend waiting for me in the lobby.
zh: 我有个朋友在大厅等我。

en: I'm looking for a gift for my friend.
I came upon a friend of mine.
I rent a car from my friend.
I believe in friendship.
My heart failed me.
I summoned up my courage, and walked inside.
I was awarded an honor prize.
I found it impossible to win the championship.
zh: 我觉得拿冠军根本没戏。

en: I make an excellent wife for him.
zh: 我对他来说是个极好的妻子。

en: I realized I was off my guard.
I felt sad for no reason.
zh: 我莫名其妙地感到难过。

en: I may have made some minor mistakes in translation.
zh: 我翻译时可能出了点小错。

en: I think it's important to keep a promise.
I think, keeping promises is important.
zh: 我觉得吧，遵守诺言很重要。

en: I regret not having kept my promise.
I make a point of being in time for appointments.
I make it a rule never to be late for appointments.
I walked about a mile.
I became a director.
I try to read as many valuable books as I can.
zh: 我尽量多读点有意义的书。

en: I like wild flowers.
I'm afraid of wild animals.
I like to roam about the fields.
I walked around in the field.
I quit the baseball club last week.
I want to be a baseball player.
I like playing baseball.
I prefer tennis to baseball.
zh: 比起棒球，我更喜欢网球。

en: I like to watch a baseball game.
I like to watch baseball games.
I like watching baseball games.
I have been to see the baseball game.
zh: 我去看过那场棒球赛了。

en: I am a member of the baseball team.
I belong to the baseball team.
I was dropped from the baseball team.
I like baseball very much.
I like baseball.
I can play baseball, tennis, volleyball, and so on.
zh: 我会打棒球、网球、排球什么的。

en: I will get to the foot of the hill before dawn.
zh: 天亮前我会赶到山脚下。

en: I waited for my husband till after midnight.
zh: 我等我老公一直等到半夜。

en: I awoke three times in the night.
I woke up three times during the night.
I went to bed late at night.
I worked far into the night.
I am used to staying up till late at night.
I'm used to staying up late at night.
I stayed up till late at night.
I stayed up late.
I am used to sitting up late at night.
I am used to staying up late at night.
I am not used to sitting up late at night.
I am not used to staying up late at night.
I make it a rule not to sit up late.
I make it a rule not to stay up late.
I am accustomed to staying up late.
I don't like going out by myself at night.
zh: 我不喜欢晚上一个人出门。

en: I arrived at Osaka Station at night.
I never cut my nails at night.
I was watching TV at night.
I was asked to open the gate.
I parked my car by the gate.
I'll come back.
As soon as I arrived at the destination, I called him.
zh: 我一到地方就给他打了电话。

en: When I am going to visit someone I look up to, I first write to him and tell him why.
zh: 去拜访我敬仰的人之前，我会先写信告诉他原因。

en: I'm going to have my eyes examined.
zh: 我打算去检查一下视力。

en: By the look in his eye I could tell that he was speaking tongue in cheek.
zh: 看他的眼神我就知道他在开玩笑。

en: My sight isn't good; I have to wear glasses.
zh: 我视力不太好，得戴眼镜。

en: I thought it wiser to hold my tongue.
zh: 我觉得还是保持沉默比较明智。

en: She got all the more angry for my silence.
zh: 见我不说话，她反而更生气了。

en: I must attend my history class on Thursday.
zh: 我周四必须去上历史课。

en: I bought two cotton shirts.
zh: 我买了两件全棉的衬衫。

en: I chopped a tree down.
I tried flying from the top of the tree.
I have a wooden comb.
I made a desk of wood.
I sat down in the shade of a tree and read the book.
I let go of the rope.
I caught a carp in a net.
zh: 我用网抓到了一条鲤鱼。

en: I have a dog trained as a seeing eye dog.
zh: 我有一只受过训练的导盲犬。

en: I studied like anything.
I held the fur coat close to my cheek and dreamt of the day I would be able to afford it.
zh: 我把皮草大衣贴在脸颊上，梦想着哪天能买得起它。

en: I don't care for imitation.
I made a model plane.
I lost face.
I anticipated trouble.
I feel happy because I am quit of that trouble.
zh: 摆脱了那个麻烦，我感到很高兴。

en: I will go to Hokkaido tomorrow.
I will not be busy tomorrow.
I'll be busy tomorrow.
I will be busy tomorrow.
I must remember to buy that book tomorrow.
zh: 我明天得记得买那本书。

en: I will have to study tomorrow.
I am off duty tomorrow.
I am going to call on her tomorrow.
I will help him tomorrow.
I will call on him tomorrow.
I'm going to see him tomorrow.
I'll be seeing him tomorrow.
I'll meet him tomorrow.
I'll come back to Japan tomorrow.
I will go to Tokyo tomorrow.
I am going to Tokyo tomorrow.
I'd like to sleep late tomorrow.
I am going to go to Tokyo tomorrow.
I'll leave Osaka for Tokyo tomorrow.
zh: 我明天离开大阪去东京。

en: I must leave early tomorrow.
I will get up early tomorrow.
I am going to write a letter tomorrow.
I may die tomorrow.
I will not go to school tomorrow.
I won't go to school tomorrow.
I will not be free tomorrow.
I will go to Kumamoto to see Mr Aoi tomorrow.
zh: 我明天去熊本看葵先生。

en: I will go to Kumamoto to see Mr. Aoi tomorrow.
zh: 我明天去熊本看葵先生。

en: I plan to go to Kumamoto tomorrow to see Mr. Aoi.
zh: 我打算明天去熊本看葵先生。

en: I've got to go to another dreary meeting tomorrow.
zh: 我明天还得去开一个枯燥的会。

en: I have to get through with the work by tomorrow.
zh: 我明天之前得把这活儿干完。

en: I must put this letter into French by tomorrow.
zh: 我明天之前得把这封信翻译成法语。

en: I must get up as early as I can tomorrow morning.
zh: 我明天早上得尽量早起。

en: I'm going to see the baseball game tomorrow.
I have got to leave here early tomorrow morning.
zh: 我明天早上得早点离开这儿。

en: I will be watching TV about this time tomorrow.
zh: 明天这时候我应该在看电视。

en: I will be free tomorrow afternoon.
I will be all tied up tomorrow afternoon.
I am going to play tennis tomorrow.
I am to meet the man tomorrow.
I'll be there tomorrow.
I will be there tomorrow.
I am going to play soccer tomorrow.
I will come back to Canada tomorrow.
I'm leaving for Canada tomorrow.
I am leaving for the United States tomorrow.
I will go to America tomorrow.
I will be fourteen years old tomorrow.
I'm going to call at his house tomorrow.
I like light colors.
I like light colours.
I slept with the light off.
I don't forget turning out the light.
I didn't turn off the light.
I ran for my life.
I aspire to fame.
I do not care for fame.
I went to elementary school in Nagoya.
zh: 我是在名古屋上的小学。

en: When I visited my friend in Nagoya, I was treated to delicious soba.
zh: 我去名古屋看朋友的时候，他请我吃了好吃的荞麦面。

en: I am planning to make an overnight trip to Nagoya.
I take great pains in educating my daughter.
zh: 我在教育女儿上费了不少心。

en: I've worked out a good plan.
I have no idea how to do deal with my daughter.
zh: 我不知道该拿我女儿怎么办。

en: I opened an account in my daughter's name.
zh: 我用我女儿的名义开了一个账户。

en: I'm going to buy a camera for my daughter.
zh: 我打算给我女儿买个相机。

en: I'm anxious that my daughter should succeed.
zh: 我很希望我女儿能成功。

en: I'm convinced that my daughter will pass the exam.
zh: 我坚信我女儿能通过考试。

en: I'm sure that my daughter will pass the exam.
zh: 我肯定我女儿能过考试。

en: I have a daughter.
I got the ticket for free.
I was forced to sign my name.
I was compelled to confess.
I will accomplish my purpose at any cost.
zh: 不论付出什么代价，我都要达到目的。

en: I bought a camera free of tax.
I ran out of the room without knowing what I was doing.
zh: 我稀里糊涂地就跑出了房间。

en: Now I have the hat which I thought was lost.
zh: 之前以为丢了的那顶帽子，现在找回来了。

en: I think I was dancing in my sleep.
zh: 我觉得我刚才梦游跳舞了。

en: I awoke from a dream.
I had a cup of tea to keep myself awake.
I fought against sleep.
I had read only a few pages before I fell asleep.
zh: 我才看了几页就睡着了。

en: I saw a sleeping dog.
zh: 我看见一只正在睡觉的狗。

en: I am on the side of democracy.
I don't care a bit about the future.
I have grown out of the habit of reading comics.
I read comic books.
I love comic books.
I like comic books.
I've lost my fountain pen. I have to buy one tomorrow.
zh: 我的钢笔丢了，明天得买一支。

en: I'm the youngest in the family.
I'm the baby of the family.
I'm the youngest child in the family.
I like to take a hot bath every night before bed.
zh: 我喜欢每晚睡前泡个热水澡。

en: I am at home every evening.
I am accustomed to studying English every evening.
zh: 我习惯了每天晚上学英语。

en: I listen to the radio every night.
I go to bed at eleven every night.
zh: 我每天晚上十一点睡觉。

en: I catch a cold every year.
I go to the country every summer.
I worked hard day after day.
zh: 我日复一日地努力工作。

en: I go to work every day by train.
I worked on it day after day.
zh: 我天天都在忙活这件事。

en: I help mother do the household chores every day.
I walk every day.
I decided to study every day.
He goes to school to study every day.
I call her up every day.
I keep my diary every day.
I am keeping a diary every day.
zh: 我每天都在坚持写日记。

en: I go to Tokyo every day.
I water the flowers in the garden every day.
zh: 我每天都给花园里的花浇水。

en: I have a boiled egg for breakfast every day.
zh: 我每天早餐吃一个白煮蛋。

en: I run every day.
I go home early every day.
I wash clothes every day.
I make it a rule to study math every day.
zh: 我规定自己每天都要学数学。

en: I walk in the forest every day.
zh: 我每天都在森林里散步。

en: I go to work by car every day.
I waited every day for my dog to come home.
zh: 我每天都等着我的狗回家。

en: I have breakfast at seven every morning.
zh: 我每天早上七点吃早饭。

en: I take a walk every morning.
I am in the habit of taking a walk every day.
zh: 我习惯每天都去散散步。

en: I go to work every day.
I wash my face every morning.
I walk to school every day.
I speak English daily.
I speak English every day.
I study English half an hour every day.
I study English every day.
I swim every day.
I go swimming every day.
Not a day passed but I practiced playing the piano.
zh: 我没有哪天不练钢琴的。

en: I play tennis every day.
I use it every day.
I go by that church every day.
zh: 我每天都会经过那座教堂。

en: I play soccer every day.
I take a bath every day.
I work from nine to five every day.
I leave home before eight o'clock every morning.
zh: 我每天早上八点前出门。

en: I get up at six every morning.
I get up at 6 o'clock every morning.
I study for 3 hours every day.
zh: I study for 3 hours every day.

en: I take two newspapers daily.
I get two hour's exercise every day.
zh: 我每天都锻炼两个小时。

en: I have a bath every day.
I go to bed at ten every day.
I make it a rule to get up at six in the morning.
zh: 我习惯每天早上六点起床。

en: I run before breakfast every morning.
zh: 我每天早饭前都会去跑步。

en: I make it a rule to jog every morning.
I have breakfast every morning.
I eat breakfast every morning.
I would sooner die than get up early every morning.
zh: 要我每天早起，还不如让我去死。

en: I make it a rule to take a walk every morning.
zh: 我习惯每天早上散散步。

en: I take light exercise every morning.
zh: 我每天早上都做点简单的运动。

en: I get on the subway every morning at Ginza.
zh: 我每天早上都在银座坐地铁。

en: I go by that shop every morning on my way to school.
zh: 我每天早上上学路上都会经过那家店。

en: Every morning I make it a rule to watch the English course on TV.
zh: 我每天早上都会准时看电视里的英语课。

en: I keep fit by jogging every morning.
zh: 我每天早上靠慢跑来健身。

en: I report to work at 9 o'clock every morning.
I leave for school at eight every morning.
zh: 我每天早上八点出发去学校。

en: I told him that I get up at seven every morning.
zh: 我告诉他我每天早上七点起床。

en: I leave home for the company at seven every morning.
zh: 我每天早上七点出门去公司。

en: I work every morning in Central Park at 6 a.m.
zh: 我每天早上六点都在中央公园工作。

en: I make it a rule to get up at six every morning.
zh: 我每天早上都坚持六点起床。

en: I make it a rule to take a walk for half an hour every morning.
zh: 我每天早上都坚持散步半小时。

en: I always take a bath in the morning.
I jog before breakfast every morning.
zh: 我每天早饭前都会慢跑。

en: I walk my dog along the river every morning.
zh: 我每天早上都沿着河边遛狗。

en: I brush my teeth clean after meals.
I visit my parents every Sunday without fail.
zh: 我每个星期天都雷打不动地去看我父母。

en: I play tennis every Sunday.
I make it a rule to play tennis with him Sundays.
zh: 我习惯每周日跟他打网球。

en: I get a haircut every month.
I must return a debt every month.
I take five kinds of magazines every month.
zh: 我每个月都订五种杂志。

en: I give my mother fifty thousand yen on payday every month.
zh: 我每个月发工资那天都会给我妈五万日元。

en: I spend less money on clothes than my sister does.
zh: 我买衣服花的钱比我姐少。

en: I left earlier than my sister.
I'm looking for a gym suit for my sister.
zh: 我在给我姐找运动服呢。

en: I gave my sister a doll.
I let my sister use my new computer.
zh: 我让我姐用我的新电脑。

en: I bought my sister a new hat.
zh: 我给我姐买了个新帽子。

en: I gave my sister a dictionary.
People say I look about the same age as my sister.
zh: 大家都说我和我姐看起来差不多大。

en: I am widely different from my little sister in character and habits.
zh: 我和我妹的性格和习惯完全不同。

en: I share the room with my sister.
I do not have a sister.
I don't have a younger sister.
I discouraged my sister from going out with the leader of the pack.
zh: 我劝我姐别跟那个带头的混在一起。

en: I don't really look at it that way.
I couldn't but speak the truth.
I actually saw a ghost.
I'm really concerned about your future.
zh: 我真的很担心你的未来。

en: I really enjoyed it.
I'm really longing for summer vacation.
I haven't read all the books on the shelves.
zh: 书架上的书我还没全看完。

en: It's not as if I had read all the books on the shelf.
zh: 我又没把书架上的书全看过。

en: I am allowed 1,000 yen a month for books.
zh: 我每个月有一千日元买书的钱。

en: I have a large number of books on my bookshelf.
I'm going to deal with the problem in this chapter.
zh: 我打算处理一下这一章里的问题。

en: I had known his name for some time before I entered this school.
zh: 进这所学校之前我就知道他的名字好久了。

en: I meant what I said.
I bought a book.
I bought a book and he a ruler.
zh: 我买了一本书，他买了一把尺子。

en: I'll be reading a book.
I was reading a book.
I have little time to read.
I like to read books.
I am fond of reading.
I went to the library to read books.
I get knowledge by reading books.
I do not read books.
I put the book down and turned on the light.
I returned the book to its shelf.
I ordered some books from London.
I paid five dollars for the book.
zh: 我花了五美元买这本书。

en: I was absorbed in a book and didn't hear you call.
zh: 我看书看入迷了，没听到你叫我。

en: I spent ten dollars on books.
I spent ten dollars on a book.
zh: 我花了十美元买了一本书。

en: I could do nothing but stare stupidly at the printed page.
zh: 我只能傻傻地盯着书页发呆。

en: I want a book.
I wanted to live in Hokkaido, but I couldn't.
zh: 我以前想住北海道，但是没住成。

en: I read a book of adventure stories.
zh: 我看了一本冒险故事书。

en: I yield to no one in abhorrence of violence.
zh: 我对暴力的厌恶不比任何人少。

en: I'm not busy.
We abhor violence.
We hate violence.
I'm too busy to help him.
I am too busy to go.
I'm too busy to go.
I cannot afford the time for a vacation.
I was busy, but I helped Mother.
zh: 我虽然很忙，但还是帮了妈妈。

en: I helped my mother even though I was busy.
zh: 尽管我很忙，我还是帮了妈妈。

en: I am busy now and can't play with you.
zh: 我现在很忙，没法陪你玩。

en: I can't help you because I am busy.
I can't help you because I'm busy.
As I'm very busy, don't count on me.
I'm very busy so don't count on me.
I am busy, and I'm not interested in that, either.
zh: 我挺忙的，而且我对那个也没兴趣。

en: I must remember to post the letter.
I have to remember to mail the letter.
I took off my hat and entered the church.
I gave my hat a brush.
I intend to become a lawyer.
I will follow the law.
I have a good sense of direction, so I don't get lost.
zh: 我方向感很好，所以不会迷路。

en: I have no sense of direction so I always travel with a compass.
zh: 我完全没方向感，所以出门总是带着指南针。

en: I often play tennis after school.
I will hand in my report after school.
I don't study after school.
I play the guitar after school.
I played tennis after school.
I often play soccer after school.
I am going to play soccer after school.
He wrote out a thorough report.
zh: 他写了一份非常详尽的报告。

en: I've finished typing the report.
When I heard it, I was dumbfounded.
zh: 听到那个的时候，我整个人都傻了。

en: I have three cousins on my mother's side.
I love, and will continue to love, my mother country.
zh: 我爱我的祖国，而且会一直爱下去。

en: I love my mother very much.
I'm waiting for my mother.
I followed my mother's example.
I said that to please my mother.
zh: 我那样说是为了让我妈开心。

en: I'm no better at cooking than my mother.
I cannot cook as well as my mother does.
I don't get up as early as my mother.
I helped my mother with the cooking.
I have to help Mother.
I have to help my mother.
I must help my mother.
I went to the hospital to see my mother.
I had a white dress made by my mother.
zh: 我妈给我做了一件白裙子。

en: I am tied to my mother's apron strings.
I asked my mother if breakfast was ready.
I am writing to you on behalf of my mother.
zh: 我替我妈给你写这封信。

en: I want my mother to get well soon.
zh: 我希望我妈快点儿好起来。

en: I resemble my mother.
I ran to my mother.
I was made to stay at home by mother.
I had all my clothes washed by my mother.
zh: 我的衣服全是我妈洗的。

en: I went to Disneyland with my mother.
I'll help my mother wash the dishes after supper.
zh: 晚饭后我会帮我妈洗碗。

en: I'm really attached to my mother.
I helped my mother clean the kitchen.
I helped my mother wash the dishes.
I've never heard my mother sing a song.
zh: 我从来没听过我妈唱歌。

en: I hear from my mother every month.
zh: 我妈每个月都会跟我联系。

en: I saw my mother hide the cake.
zh: 我看见我妈把蛋糕藏起来了。

en: When I was badly off, I fell back on him.
zh: 我最困难的时候，全靠他帮忙。

en: I'd rather take a taxi than walk.
zh: 我宁愿打车也不想走路。

en: I will go on foot.
I go to school on foot.
I walk to school.
I have to walk to school.
I had to walk home.
I was captured.
Wherever I have my lunch box, I enjoy it.
zh: 不管在哪儿吃便当，我都很开心。

en: I decided to be a lawyer.
I decided to become a lawyer.
I will establish myself as a lawyer.
I go to bed after I study.
I'm tired of studying.
I was tired from studying.
I want to get a job that mixes work and play.
zh: 我想找个能边工作边玩的工作。

en: I am going to my room, where I can study.
I'm going to my room, so I can study.
zh: 我回房间了，这样我就能学习了。

en: I have to study.
I need to study.
I must study.
I watch television before I study.
zh: 我学习之前会看会儿电视。

en: I have no leisure to study.
I often make use of the library to study.
I am planning on studying and playing the flute by turns.
zh: 我打算轮流学习和吹长笛。

en: I am going to study.
I went to America to study.
I watched television instead of studying.
zh: 我没学习，反而看了电视。

en: I failed the exam because I didn't study.
zh: 我因为没学习，考试没及格。

en: I am studying.
I'm studying.
I played tennis after I studied.
I don't like studying.
I hate studying.
I have some correspondence to deal with.
I don't like to leave people hanging.
I looked all around, but I could see nobody there.
zh: 我四处看了看，但一个人也没看到。

en: I saw a dog with one paw bandaged.
zh: 我看到一只狗，它的一只爪子包着绷带。

en: I'm going through changes.
zh: 我最近在经历一些变化。

en: I have other matters on hand.
Please don't look at me suspiciously.
zh: 别用那种怀疑的眼神看着我。

en: I'm not a particularly suspicious-looking person.
zh: 我看着也不像什么可疑的人。

en: I'm afraid I'm not much of a musician.
zh: 我恐怕没什么音乐天赋。

en: I hit my head hard against the wall.
zh: 我的头重重地撞到了墙上。

en: I peeped out through a crack in the wall.
I hung a picture on the wall.
I am American.
I wear white shirts on weekdays.
I sleep six hours a day on average.
zh: 我平均每天睡六个小时。

en: I am a student at Hyogo University.
I am a Hyogo University student.
I am a senior at Hyogo University.
zh: 我是兵库大学大四的学生。

en: I'm a fourth-year student at Hyogo University.
I pricked up my ears.
I live in Hyogo.
I live in Hyogo Prefecture.
I make a point of arranging sentences in my mind before writing them down.
zh: 我习惯在写之前先在脑子里把句子排好。

en: I'm supposed to be sensible human.
zh: 我应该是个明事理的人。

en: I prefer payment in full to payment in part.
zh: 比起分期支付，我更喜欢全款付清。

en: I took the right fork of the road.
I'm not interested in material gain.
zh: 我对物质利益不感兴趣。

en: I have trouble with physics.
I'm not in the least interested in physics.
zh: 我对物理一点儿兴趣也没有。

en: I'm not at all interested in physics.
zh: 我对物理完全不感兴趣。

en: I'm not interested in physics at all.
zh: 我对物理一点儿都不感兴趣。

en: I have a liking for chemistry as well as for physics.
zh: 物理和化学我都很喜欢。

en: I like physics, and I like mathematics even more.
zh: 我喜欢物理，更喜欢数学。

en: I'm not interested in material gains.
zh: 我对物质回报不感兴趣。

en: I am not interested in material gain.
I'm not good at classifying things.
I've written a lot of stories.
I like to read story books.
I am surprised to hear that prices have gone up so high.
zh: 听说物价涨了这么多，我很惊讶。

en: I prefer reading to writing.
zh: 比起写东西，我更喜欢看书。

en: I use money for buying clothes.
zh: 我把钱都花在买衣服上了。

en: I went home in order to change my clothes.
I like to keep my clothes for as long as possible.
zh: 我喜欢把衣服穿得越久越好。

en: I have all my suits made to order.
zh: 我的西装全都是定制的。

en: I usually buy my clothes at the department store.
zh: 我通常在百货公司买衣服。

en: I enjoyed watching the Easter Parade.
zh: 我挺喜欢看复活节游行的。

en: I took a bath and then had a glass of beer.
zh: 我洗完澡后喝了杯啤酒。

en: I warmed myself in the bath.
zh: 我泡了个热水澡暖和一下。

en: I am afraid I have a touch of a cold.
It seems I have a slight cold.
I didn't call on him because I had a cold.
Since I had a cold, I didn't go visit him.
zh: 因为感冒了，所以我没去看他。

en: I tend to catch colds.
I think I'm getting a cold.
I didn't go out for fear of catching cold.
I didn't want to catch a cold, so I didn't go out.
zh: 我不想感冒，所以没出去。

en: I have been down with a cold.
I caught a cold. That is why I could not attend the meeting yesterday.
zh: 我感冒了，所以昨天没去开会。

en: I'm coming down with a cold.
It took me more than one month to get over my cold.
zh: 我感冒了一个多月才好。

en: It took me ten days to get over my cold.
I ripped the envelope open.
I had my hat blown off.
I opened the envelope and pulled out a letter.
zh: 我拆开信封，拿出了一封信。

en: I forgot to attach a stamp to the envelope.
zh: 我忘了在信封上贴邮票。

en: I forgot to put a stamp on the envelope.
I need an envelope, a piece of paper, and a pencil or a pen.
zh: 我需要个信封、一张纸，还要一支铅笔或钢笔。

en: I need an envelope and a piece of paper. I also need either a pencil or a pen.
zh: 我要个信封和一张纸，还要支铅笔或者钢笔。

en: I was an outsider.
I'm busy looking for an apartment.
I owe two months' rent for my room.
I want my room painted white.
I don't have to clean my room.
I like to adorn my room with flowers.
I like to decorate my room with flowers.
zh: 我喜欢用花来装点房间。

en: I left a duplicate key to the room with my mother.
zh: 我把房间的备用钥匙留给我妈了。

en: I changed the arrangement of the furniture in my room.
zh: 我把房间里的家具重新摆了一下。

en: I entered the room and shook hands with him.
I like to have a full-length mirror in my bedroom.
zh: 我喜欢在卧室里放一面穿衣镜。

en: I sleep in my room.
I will be waiting for you in my room.
I like such fruits as grapes and peaches.
zh: 我喜欢葡萄和桃子这类水果。

en: I like grape jelly best.
I am a dancer by trade and I teach jazz dance.
zh: 我是个职业舞者，教爵士舞。

en: I borrowed money from my father.
I'm very proud of my father.
I introduced my father to the teacher.
zh: 我把我爸介绍给了老师。

en: I tried to argue my father into buying a new car.
zh: 我试着说服我爸买辆新车。

en: I'm proud of my father.
I have been to Kyoto station to see my father off.
I am tired of hearing Father's stories.
zh: 我听腻了我爸讲的故事。

en: I have read every book in my father's bookcase.
zh: 我把我爸书架上的书都看过了。

en: I visited my father's grave.
zh: 我去祭拜了我父亲的墓。

en: I don't know my father's annual income.
zh: 我不知道我爸的年收入。

en: I am acting for my father.
I have to go there for my father.
I always felt ill at ease in my father's company.
zh: 跟我爸在一起我总觉得不自在。

en: I asked for my father's help.
I was absolved from paying my father's debt.
I took over my father's job.
I must be about my father's business.
zh: 我得去忙我爸生意上的事。

en: I think I will occupy myself in my father's business.
zh: 我想我会去打理我爸的生意。

en: I was given a minor share of my father's wealth.
zh: 我只分到了我爸的一小部分财产。

en: I supported her even against my father.
zh: 即使我爸反对，我也还是支持她。

en: I had my photograph taken by my father.
zh: 这张照片是我爸帮我拍的。

en: I don't take after my father.
I gave my father a silk tie.
zh: 我送了我爸一条真丝领带。

en: I asked my father to buy this toy.
zh: 我让我爸给我买这个玩具。

en: I suggested to my father that Kumiko study in China.
zh: 我跟我爸建议，让久美子去中国留学。

en: I can't talk with my father without losing my temper.
zh: 我一跟我爸说话就忍不住发脾气。

en: I'm as tall as my father.
I like to go fishing with my father.
zh: 我喜欢跟我爸一起去钓鱼。

en: I'm looking forward to going hunting with my father.
zh: 我挺期待跟我爸去打猎的。

en: I never felt at ease in my father's company.
zh: 跟我爸在一起我总觉得不自在。

en: I don't see eye to eye with my father.
zh: 我跟我爸总是意见不合。

en: I often went to the movies with my father.
zh: 我经常和我爸一起去看电影。

en: I know not only the father, but also the son.
zh: 我不仅认识他父亲，还认识他儿子。

en: I told Dad about it.
I'm proud of my father being a good cook.
zh: 我挺自豪我爸厨艺那么好。

en: I'm not ashamed of my father's being poor.
zh: 我不觉得我爸穷有什么丢脸的。

en: I'm not ashamed of my father being poor.
zh: 我不觉得我爸穷有什么丢脸的。

en: I helped my father wash his car.
I want to bring up my son as my father did me.
zh: 我想像我爸带我那样带我儿子。

en: I was given a computer game by my father.
zh: 我爸送了我一个电脑游戏。

en: My father gave me a game.
I helped my father with the work.
I don't like my father's attending the meeting.
zh: 我不喜欢我爸去参加那个会议。

en: I want my father to see the movie.
zh: 我想让我爸看看这部电影。

en: I am pleased with this watch my father gave me.
zh: 我挺喜欢我爸送我的这块表。

en: I usually get up at about six-thirty.
zh: 我一般六点半左右起床。

en: I usually get home by six o'clock.
I usually wake up at six.
I usually watch television before supper.
zh: 我习惯在晚饭前看会儿电视。

en: I usually spend the whole day idly on Sunday.
zh: 周日我通常整天都闲着。

en: I usually get up at seven.
I usually go to bed at nine.
I usually have a light breakfast.
zh: 我早饭一般吃得很简单。

en: I normally get up at 6 o'clock.
I usually get up at 6:00.
I'm tired of working a nine-to-five job.
zh: 我烦透了朝九晚五的工作。

en: I usually get up at eight.
I usually get up at eight o'clock.
I usually get up at 8.
I usually wake up at 6.
I usually go to market on Friday.
I usually go to school by bus.
zh: 我通常坐公交车去上学。

en: I usually have breakfast at seven.
I am frightened of walking in the darkness.
I was not so much scared as amazed.
zh: 我倒没怎么被吓到，反而是挺惊讶的。

en: I have seen Mt. Fuji.
I've seen Mt. Fuji.
I climbed to the top of Mt. Fuji.
I want to climb Mt. Fuji.
I've never climbed Mt. Fuji.
I've climbed Mt. Fuji.
I've climbed Mt. Fuji four times.
I have climbed Mt. Fuji three times.
I've climbed Mt. Fuji three times.
I've climbed Mt. Fuji twice.
I don't care for wealth and fame.
I'm not satisfied.
I'm dissatisfied.
I can't help but complain.
I would rather be poor than make money by dishonest means.
zh: 我宁愿穷也不愿意靠不正当手段赚钱。

en: I dreamed a strange dream.
I bear in mind that misfortunes never come singly.
zh: 我记着“祸不单行”这句话。

en: I'm all thumbs.
I, who am poor, cannot afford it.
I'm poor.
I am nothing but a poor peasant.
I am poor, whereas my brothers are very rich.
zh: 我很穷，但我兄弟们很有钱。

en: I tanned myself on the beach.
I asked after my sick friend.
zh: 我去探望了生病的朋友。

en: I've been to Osaka to ask after my sick friend.
zh: 我去大阪探望了生病的朋友。

en: I took care of my sick sister.
I didn't go on account of illness.
I was absent from school because of illness.
I was absent from school because I was sick.
Sickness kept me from attending the party.
zh: 我因为生病没去成聚会。

en: I am depressed by my illness.
zh: 我因为生病心情很郁闷。

en: I had to have my brother help me with my homework due to illness.
zh: 我因为生病只好让哥哥帮我做作业。

en: Illness prevented me from going to school.
I could not go to the party because of illness.
zh: 因为生病，我没去成聚会。

en: I had to decline the invitation because I was ill.
zh: 因为生病，我不得不拒绝了邀请。

en: I had to decline the invitation because I was sick.
zh: 因为生病，我不得不拒绝了邀请。

en: I've been on sick leave.
As I was ill, I couldn't go to the meeting.
zh: 因为生病，我没能去开会。

en: I was ill, otherwise I would have attended the meeting.
zh: 我生病了，不然我就去开会了。

en: I was ill, otherwise I would've attended the meeting.
zh: 我生病了，不然我就去开会了。

en: Because I was sick, I didn't go.
Since I was sick, I didn't go.
As I was sick, I did not go to school.
I didn't go to school because I was sick.
Since I was sick, I didn't go to school.
I stayed at home because I was sick.
I couldn't go to work because I was sick.
zh: 因为生病，我没法去上班。

en: I recovered from my illness.
I was held up on my way to the hospital in a traffic jam.
zh: 我去医院的路上堵车了。

en: I work for a hospital.
I work in a hospital.
I fell down on the ice.
I want to learn standard English.
I slipped on the ice and hurt my head.
zh: 我在冰上滑倒磕到了头。

en: I went from door to door trying to sell encyclopedias.
zh: 我挨家挨户地推销百科全书。

en: I am of the opinion that necessity is the mother of invention.
zh: 我觉得需要是发明之母。

en: I will take such action as seems necessary.
zh: 我会根据需要采取行动。

en: I will lose weight.
I will call you without fail.
zh: 我肯定会给你打电话的。

en: I am bound to solve this question.
zh: 我一定要解决这个问题。

en: I like to wear my skirts knee length.
zh: 我喜欢穿到膝盖那么长的裙子。

en: I am deeply interested in art.
I am a lover of the beautiful.
zh: 我热爱一切美好的事物。

en: I saw a beautiful bird.
zh: 我看到一只很漂亮的鸟。

en: I caught a beautiful butterfly.
zh: 我抓到了一只漂亮的蝴蝶。

en: I couldn't restrain a smile.
I prefer to travel by air.
I looked down on Mt. Fuji from the window of the plane.
zh: 我从飞机窗户向下看了看富士山。

en: I got airsick and felt like throwing up.
I was very much afraid in the airplane.
I was very afraid in the airplane.
I've never flown in an airplane.
I arrived just in time for the plane.
I want to travel by airplane.
I went to Kyushu by airplane.
I can jump.
I can fly.
I know how to fly.
I am so busy that I have no time to read.
I'm so busy that I have no time to read.
I'm so busy I have no time to read.
I'm really unhappy about this.
zh: 我对这事儿挺不开心的。

en: I was very tired.
I was very exhausted.
I caught the last train because I walked extremely quickly.
zh: 我走得特别快，所以赶上了末班车。

en: I was able to catch the last train because I walked very quickly.
zh: 因为我走得很快，我才赶上了末班车。

en: Since I walked very fast, I was in time for the last train.
zh: 因为我走得快，我赶上了末班车。

en: I got up so early that I caught the train.
zh: 我起得很早，所以赶上了火车。

en: I have a very old stamp.
I own some very old stamps.
I was in such a hurry that I forgot to lock the door.
I am confronted with a great danger.
zh: 我正面临着巨大的危险。

en: I was too tired to go on working.
I am tired and I want to go to bed.
Though I am tired, I will work hard.
zh: 虽然我很累，但我会努力工作的。

en: Even though I'm tired, I'll study hard.
zh: 就算累，我也会好好学习的。

en: I'm tired, but I'll study hard.
zh: 我挺累的，但我会好好学习。

en: I'm tired, so I should get some rest.
"I am not tired." "Neither am I."
I am tired; nevertheless, I must finish my homework.
zh: 虽然很累，但我必须把作业写完。

en: I was very tired, so I went to bed early.
zh: 我太累了，所以早早就睡了。

en: I was tired, so I didn't go.
I was too tired to walk any more.
Since I was tired, I went to bed early.
zh: 因为累了，我早早就睡了。

en: Tired out, I carried on working.
zh: 累得不行，但我还是继续干活了。

en: Tired as I was, I went on working.
zh: 尽管很累，我还是继续工作了。

en: Though I was tired, I did my best.
Although I was tired, I did my best.
zh: 虽然累，但我还是尽了全力。

en: Although I was tired, I did my very best.
zh: 虽然很累，但我真的尽了最大的努力。

en: I was tired, but I couldn't sleep.
I was very tired, but I was nevertheless unable to sleep.
zh: 我特别累，但还是怎么都睡不着。

en: I was tired and, what is worse, I was sleepy.
zh: 我本来就累，更糟的是还特别困。

en: I was tired.
I got tired.
I'm too tired to walk.
I read the book in the light of criticism.
zh: 我是带着批判的眼光看这本书的。

en: I prefer comedy to tragedy.
zh: 比起悲剧，我更喜欢喜剧。

en: I like to feel sad. I know that most people try to avoid any kind of sad feeling. But I think that is wrong.
zh: 我喜欢忧伤的感觉。我知道大多数人都想躲开悲伤，但我觉得那样不对。

en: I do not feel sad.
I'm not sad.
I don't feel sad.
I like stories that have sad endings.
zh: 我喜欢悲剧结局的故事。

en: I don't like sad movies.
I was more angry than sad.
zh: 我比起难过，更多的是生气。

en: I wasn't so much sad as I was angry.
zh: 我与其说是难过，不如说是生气。

en: I'll share both troubles and joys with you.
I'll go through both the good times and the bad with you.
zh: 不管是顺境还是逆境，我都会陪着你。

en: I'll stay with you through both the happy times and the sad times.
zh: 无论是开心还是难过，我都会陪在你身边。

en: I tried to stop her but she made off in a hurry.
zh: 我想拦住她，但她匆匆忙忙就跑了。

en: I look on her as my sister.
I mistook her for Minako. They look so much alike.
zh: 我把她错认成美奈子了，她们长得太像了。

en: I made her my secretary.
I took her for her sister. They look so much alike.
zh: 我把她当成她姐姐了，她们长得太像了。

en: I mistook her for her sister. They look so much alike.
zh: 我把她给认错成她姐姐了，她们长得简直一模一样。

en: It took me some time to persuade her.
zh: 我花了好一番功夫才说服她。

en: I needed time to convince her.
zh: 我需要点时间才能说服她。

en: I waited for her as long as two hours.
zh: 我等了她足足两个小时。

en: I met her at Tokyo Station.
I gave offense to her.
I made her angry.
She is a stranger to me.
I don't know her.
I don't know her and I don't think I want to.
zh: 我不认识她，也不太想认识。

en: I don't know her, nor do I want to.
zh: 我不认识她，也没兴趣认识。

en: I became weary of waiting for her.
I failed to persuade her.
I tried to persuade her in vain.
I talked her into marrying him.
I consider her as an honest woman.
zh: 我觉得她是个挺诚实的人。

en: I consider her an honest woman.
I consider her to be an honest woman.
I think she's an honest woman.
I persuaded her to substitute for me in that job.
zh: 我说服了她替我做那份工作。

en: I admire her truly.
I cannot but believe her.
I was able to help her.
I treated her as my own daughter.
zh: 我把她当亲生女儿一样看待。

en: I had a good opinion of her.
zh: 我以前对她印象挺好的。

en: I couldn't stop myself from longing for her.
I want to make her happy.
I don't like her.
I will make her happy.
I never see her without thinking of her mother.
zh: 我一见到她就会想起她妈妈。

en: I was looking at her.
I excited her.
I cannot excuse her.
I can't forgive her.
I can't excuse her.
I saw her home.
I took her home.
I look on her as my best friend.
zh: 我把她看作我最好的朋友。

en: I think of her as my closest friend.
zh: 我把她当成我最亲近的朋友。

en: I can comfort her.
I don't love her, not even if she loves me.
zh: 我不爱她，就算她爱我也没用。

en: I can't help loving her.
I don't love her.
I know her well. She is my friend.
zh: 我很了解她，她是我的朋友。

en: I know her well.
I turned away as if I didn't like her.
zh: 我转过身，装作不喜欢她的样子。

en: I wanted to surprise her.
I suggested to him that she be invited to the party.
zh: 我建议他邀请她参加聚会。

en: I know her very well.
I asked her for a date, only to have her say no.
zh: 我约她出去，结果她拒绝了。

en: I asked her for a date.
I asked her out on a date.
I caught a glimpse of her.
I know her slightly.
I hugged her tightly.
I thought her very clever.
I mistook her for Ann's sister.
zh: 我把她错认成安的姐姐了。

en: I cannot praise her enough.
I thought she was pretty.
zh: 我觉得她长得挺漂亮的。

en: I have known her for two years.
Although I am her elder, she treats me as if I were her servant.
zh: 虽然我比她大，但她把我当佣人使唤。

en: I love you more than her.
I love you more than I love her.
I think she is a good dancer.
I think she is sick.
I took her arm.
I thought it better that she should take a vacation.
zh: 我觉得她还是休个假比较好。
